sentences.english: Coal bed gas parameter well SPMT-1 is located at the Shiping well field, Guxu mining area, South Sichuan Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 1号煤层气参数井位于川南煤田古叙矿区石屏井田。

sentences.english: Production system which control the CBM well output fluctuation is a key factor to ensure production successfully.
sentences.chinese: 排采制度是保证煤层气井生产排采成功的关键要素。

sentences.english: A coal mining in thin seam is an inevitable issue of coal mining in many coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 薄煤层开采是许多矿井煤炭开采中不可避免的问题。

sentences.english: China has just started the study on coalbed methane (CBM) reserves.
sentences.chinese: 煤层气储量的研究工作才刚刚开始。

sentences.english: The application of ceramic membranes in the pretreatment of seawater desalinization;
sentences.chinese: 主要煤层含硫低与该区泻湖及表层海水淡化有关。

sentences.english: The well initially adopts a vertical inclined development, mining 5 coal seam.
sentences.chinese: 该井最初采用一立一斜的开发方式，开采5号煤层。

sentences.english: The spontaneous combustion of coal seam endangers the safe production.
sentences.chinese: 井下煤层自燃严重危害着安全生产。

sentences.english: Traditional coal depositional model can hardly explain the cause of this extra-thick coal seam.
sentences.chinese: 传统的煤沉积模式难以解释其超厚煤层的成因。

sentences.english: The principle of drilling well distribution and favorable blocks is recommended to develop CBM in Liujia Coal Mining Area.
sentences.chinese: 提出了该区煤层气开发的布井原则和有利区块。

sentences.english: The well-test is an effective way to accurately obtain coal-reservoir parameters.
sentences.chinese: 试井测试是目前能够准确获取煤层参数的有效方法。

sentences.english: Preliminary research on structural law of coal bed beneath nappe in No.
sentences.chinese: 对新集二矿推覆体下煤层构造规律进行了初步研究。

sentences.english: The flow in the cleat system can be described by Darcy's law.
sentences.chinese: 煤层气在割理系统的流动遵循达西定律。

sentences.english: Both bottom panels fitted and tacked to keel as well as along centreline seam.
sentences.chinese: 面板底部都安装和上涨到龙骨以及沿中心线煤层。

sentences.english: This paper deals with problems about thermo-dynamic theory of coal-seam gases.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了有关煤层气体的若干热力学理论问题。

sentences.english: Application result of this method to simulating coalbed methane well in Xinji is reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 把该方法应用于新集煤层气井的拟合，取得良好效果。

sentences.english: There exits bed separation zone above water-conducting crack zone overburden after coal mining.
sentences.chinese: 煤层采后覆岩中的导水裂隙带之上存在离层带。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
